data.description: Validate that: generation failures fall back gracefully, corrupted layers are detected, recovery procedures work, sessions can start even if generation fails.

properties.retrospective: Implemented comprehensive fault tolerance validation with 25 unit tests covering graceful fallback, corruption detection, recovery procedures, and session startup resilience. Fixed RecoveryResult to track orphans, added FileNotFoundError handling for race conditions, improved error handling for truncated JSON files.
